title.rendered: Enter the Slackathon showdown at Slush 2023

column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”advanced” gradient_type=”default”][vc_column_text]
Orla Reaper-Reynolds

Slack

[/vc_column_text][split_line_heading animation_type=”line-reveal-by-space” font_style=”h2″ line_reveal_by_space_text_effect=”default” content_alignment=”left” mobile_content_alignment=”inherit” link_target=”_self” text_content=”Slack is heading back to Slush 2023″ font_line_height=”1″][/split_line_heading][vc_column_text]With a longstanding presence at the event, Slack is super excited to return to Slush this year and connect with the next wave of leaders in the startup scene. In fact, we’re coming back with a competitive bang, inviting Slack champions to showcase their use cases in front of tech industry leaders.*[/vc_column_text][split_line_heading animation_type=”line-reveal-by-space” font_style=”h2″ line_reveal_by_space_text_effect=”default” content_alignment=”left” mobile_content_alignment=”inherit” link_target=”_self” text_content=”Pitch your Slack-powered productivity hacks at our official Slush side-event: Slackathon” font_line_height=”1″][/split_line_heading][vc_column_text]Slackathon is a pitch-style competition and an opportunity to showcase how your business uses Slack to make your teams more productive.

Present your productivity hacks to the best in the startup scene, network with leaders of the industry, and compete for tickets to Slush 2024 – plus we have an exciting lineup of speakers at the event!

To enter, simply tell us about all the clever automations, awesome integrations, and other Slack-led innovations that your teams are employing to drive productivity in your organization.

All of the entries will be reviewed by our judging panel and the Slackathon finalists will be announced on Nov 16. 

Finalists will be invited to come and present their pitch in front of our judging panel and live audience at our Slackathon event at Slush on Dec 1. [/vc_column_text][split_line_heading animation_type=”line-reveal-by-space” font_style=”h2″ line_reveal_by_space_text_effect=”default” content_alignment=”left” mobile_content_alignment=”inherit” link_target=”_self” text_content=”Elements we’re seeking in your Slackathon entry” font_line_height=”1″][/split_line_heading][vc_column_text]We’re looking for powerful but concise presentations that showcase your Slack-powered productivity, along with a short written entry. To enter, simply fill out this form and submit your presentation by 6 PM EET on Nov 9. For all the information you need and some tips on how to make your entry stand out, visit our website here. 

Please note, that your team must be available to attend the event in order to enter. The event will take place on Slush Day 2 (Dec 1) at Messukeskus. See our full competition terms and conditions here.

We’ll see you in Helsinki at the Slackathon – happy pitching! 

*No purchase necessary. Void where prohibited. The contest application period runs from 12th October at 9 am EET to 9th November at 6 pm EET. Open to companies registered in Norway, Finland, Sweden, and Denmark only. Country of residence and other restrictions apply. See Official Rules.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
